TITLE: Toomey defends delay of veterans health bill, says he will back it if amendment passes
SUMMARY: He explained why he blocked the passage of the the Promise to Address Comprehensive Toxics Act, which aims to expand health care access to veterans exposed to burn pits.

TITLE: Manchin to Sinema: Believe in this bill
SUMMARY: All eyes have now turned to the Arizona Democrat to see if she will support the legislation agreed to last week.

TITLE: Pelosi confirms trip to Asia but doesn't mention Taiwan
SUMMARY: She said she will visit Singapore, Malaysia, South Korea and Japan.

TITLE: Dems ready to gamble their domestic agenda on Sinema
SUMMARY: She's unlikely to say anything in public about her party's $700 billion-plus energy, tax and health care bill — until it comes to the floor.

TITLE: On Taiwan trip, McConnell says Pelosi has 'every right to go'
Senate GOP launches ad attacking Michael Benett
SUMMARY: Republicans are now putting money behind their claims that Colorado is a potential Senate pickup opportunity this fall. The National Republican Senatorial Committee launched an attack ad against Sen. Michael Bennet (D-Colo.)

TITLE: Senate GOP launches ad attacking Patty Murray
SUMMARY: Republicans are now putting money behind their claims that Washington is a potential Senate pickup opportunity this fall. The National Republican Senatorial Committee launched an attack ad against Sen. Patty Murray (D-Wash.)

TITLE: Senate GOP launches ads in two blue states
SUMMARY: The NRSC has talked for months about the two blue states being in play. This week, they're launching ads.

TITLE: GOP eyes 2024 payback for Manchin's Dems-only deal
SUMMARY: He's long been their best partner across the aisle. But Republicans are now eager to topple him in a reelection race he's not yet committed to.

TITLE: Senate GOP backtracks after veterans bill firestorm
SUMMARY: Republican leaders are promising a veterans' health care bill blocked by most of their members will pass this week, even as some still blame Democrats for the blockade.

TITLE: Manchin: Climate, tax and health care bill ‘is not about politics’
Dems dive into make-or-break week for their party-line vision
SUMMARY: They're likely to end up litigating at least some challenges to the climate, tax and health care package in real time on the Senate floor.

TITLE: Dems hurtle toward chaotic weekend with their agenda on the line
SUMMARY: First step: Get rulings from the Senate's nonpartisan rules referee. Second step: Bring the bill to the floor. Third step: The “vote-a-rama.”

TITLE: Director: FBI opened ‘a number’ of abortion-related violent extremism investigations
Video shows scene of car crash that killed Rep. Jackie Walorski, three others
Electric cars, drug costs and more: 5 battles Democrats could lose on their marquee bill
SUMMARY: A hefty amount of their party-line package is still up in the air -- and big pieces of it could fall to the Senate rules.

TITLE: Indiana GOP Rep. Walorski, three others die in auto accident
SUMMARY: The fatal Wednesday crash also killed the congresswoman's aide Emma Thomson and two others, according to the sheriff's office in Elkhart County, Ind.

TITLE: With 2024 approaching, Hawley takes a Trumpian turn to clip NATO
SUMMARY: The Missouri Republican was the only senator to vote against admitting Sweden and Finland to the military alliance.

TITLE: Why one pro-Roe Democrat is still seeking bipartisanship on abortion
SUMMARY: Sen. Tim Kaine (D-Va.) knows his cross-aisle collaboration isn't getting a vote, and he sees his progressive critics. He's not backing away.

TITLE: Senate sends veterans health care bill to Biden
SUMMARY: The Senate on Tuesday passed a sweeping expansion of veterans health care, sending it to President Joe Biden’s desk after GOP resistance held up the bill last week.

TITLE: Democrats near key vote on signature climate, tax and health care proposal
SUMMARY: One pillar of the party's plan to cut drug costs, affecting the private sector, got nixed by the Senate's nonpartisan rules referee.

TITLE: Democrats go with ‘the least bad’ tax
SUMMARY: The new excise tax on stock buybacks will satisfy Sinema while not alienating business — at least too much.

TITLE: Biden’s big bill: Two GOP strategists on how to kill it
SUMMARY: The biggest remaining obstacle for the Democrats in reconciliation is now Senate Parliamentarian Elizabeth MacDonough.

TITLE: Sinema signs onto Dems’ party-line bill ahead of momentous Saturday vote
SUMMARY: It’s a big, early win for Majority Leader Chuck Schumer and his party, even as some of the bill’s specifics are still clouded in uncertainty.
